text: The electoral district of Koblenz () is one of the 299 single-member constituencies of the German Bundestag. The electoral district contains the city of Koblenz and parts of Mayen-Koblenz and the Rhein-Lahn-Kreis. The district has been won by the CDU in every federal election since 1949. The district, currently numbered 199, has been district 200 in the 2013 election, with no changes in territory. ==Boundaries== The Wahlkreis consists of Koblenz, Bendorf, Lahnstein, and the Verbandsgemeinden Rhein-Mosel, Vallendar, Weißenthurm, Bad Ems and Loreley. == List of district representatives == {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
